name: To bee first!
description:
A project created for Love 2D game jam 2022 about a pollen collecting honey bee and forest buggies. An adventure that plays as an relaxing exploration - puzzle solving game.

The game contains a main quest and one side quest that needs to be discovered and it is much deeper than the main quest line.

After downloading the ZIP file unpack it into a new created folder named ToBeeFirst.  Play by running the exe inside the folder.

Instruction are given on the main game screen from bees or in menu by pressing button controls.

Warnings : Contains pollen, nature, bugs, arachnids and some of the nature critters that may cause shock, fear reaction or any other phobia reaction. But i assure you they are just on pictures and harmless on the screen.
